state.output:
<file>
00001| import { NextResponse } from 'next/server'
00002| import type { NextRequest } from 'next/server'
00003| import { checkMissingEnvVars } from '@/lib/env-config'
00004| 
00005| export function middleware(request: NextRequest) {
00006|   // EMERGENCY: SUPER AGGRESSIVE DEV DETECTION
00007|   const isDev = process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' || 
00008|                 process.env.NODE_ENV === undefined ||
00009|                 request.nextUrl.hostname.includes('localhost') ||
00010|                 request.nextUrl.hostname.includes('127.0.0.1') ||
00011|                 request.nextUrl.hostname.includes('.e2b.app') ||
00012|                 request.nextUrl.hostname.includes('ideavo') ||
00013|                 request.nextUrl.port !== '';
00014| 
00015|   // Skip middleware for the env-check page itself to avoid infinite redirects
00016|   if (request.nextUrl.pathname === '/env-check') {
00017|     const response = NextResponse.next()
00018|     
00019|     // Добавляем заголовки против кэширования в dev режиме
00020|     if (isDev) {
00021|       response.headers.set('Cache-Control', 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate')
00022|       response.headers.set('Pragma', 'no-cache')
00023|       response.headers.set('Expires', '0')
00024|     }
00025|     
00026|     return response
00027|   }
00028| 
00029|   // Skip middleware for API routes, static files, and Next.js internals
00030|   if (
00031|     request.nextUrl.pathname.startsWith('/api/') ||
00032|     request.nextUrl.pathname.startsWith('/_next/') ||
00033|     request.nextUrl.pathname.includes('.')
00034|   ) {
00035|     const response = NextResponse.next()
00036|     
00037|     // Добавляем заголовки против кэширования в dev режиме
00038|     if (isDev) {
00039|       response.headers.set('Cache-Control', 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate')
00040|       response.headers.set('Pragma', 'no-cache')
00041|       response.headers.set('Expires', '0')
00042|     }
00043|     
00044|     return response
00045|   }
00046| 
00047|   // Check if any required environment variables are missing
00048|   const missingEnvVars = checkMissingEnvVars()
00049| 
00050|   // If any env variables are missing, redirect to env-check page
00051|   if (missingEnvVars.length > 0) {
00052|     return NextResponse.redirect(new URL('/env-check', request.url))
00053|   }
00054| 
00055|   const response = NextResponse.next()
00056|   
00057|   // EMERGENCY: NUCLEAR CACHE HEADERS FOR DEV
00058|   if (isDev) {
00059|     response.headers.set('Cache-Control', 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate, proxy-revalidate, s-maxage=0, max-age=0')
00060|     response.headers.set('Pragma', 'no-cache')
00061|     response.headers.set('Expires', '0')
00062|     response.headers.set('Last-Modified', new Date().toUTCString())
00063|     response.headers.set('ETag', `dev-${Date.now()}`)
00064|     response.headers.set('X-Dev-Mode', 'true')
00065|     response.headers.set('X-Emergency-No-Cache', 'true')
00066|     // FIXED: Only clear cache, preserve storage for form data persistence
00067|     response.headers.set('Clear-Site-Data', '"cache"')
00068|   }
00069|   
00070|   return response
00071| }
00072| 
00073| export const config = {
00074|   matcher: [
00075|     /*
00076|      * Match all request paths except for the ones starting with:
00077|      * - api (API routes)
00078|      * - _next/static (static files)
00079|      * - _next/image (image optimization files)
00080|      * - favicon.ico (favicon file)
00081|      */
00082|     '/((?!api|_next/static|_next/image|favicon.ico).*)',
00083|   ],
00084| }
</file>
state.title: middleware.ts
